page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: My dad works for a firm called Sterling Winthrop. He makes things like medicines. Sterling Winthrop is near Cawledge View which is an estate in Alnwick. At dinner time he takes an apple and his flask with coffee in it. Every year at Sterling Winthrop there is a big party for children just before Christmas. I got a racing circuit, complete with two cars and operated by batteres from a control panel. My brother got a radio with batteries already in it. Sterling Winthrop is a drug company+ my dad used to work for Boot's Drug Company in Nottingham before he joined Sterling Winthrop in Alnwick. Sometimes he wears a white coat when he is at work. My dad goes to work on a bicycle, because the firm is near to our house or he takes a car.
